      • rollRoundDice

        public void rollRoundDice(DiceBag diceBag,
                          int round,
                          int participants)
                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                          InvalidRoundException
        Method to throw the dice at the beginning of a round. It creates a new RoundDice instance for every round and associates it to its position in the RoundTrack array (RoundTrack[round]).
        Parameters:
        diceBag - the match diceBag already shuffled
        round - round number
        participants - number of players
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - in case diceBag is null
        InvalidRoundException - in case the round number exceeds 10

      • performDiceMove

        public void performDiceMove(ChooseDiceMove move)
                     throws InvalidCellPositionException,
                            InvalidDraftPoolPosException
        Method that validates the input when the player chooses a dice to place it on his schema and calls the model methods.
        Parameters:
        move - the object representing the player move
        Throws:
        InvalidCellPositionException - in case the player gave an invalid input while choosing the cell
        InvalidDraftPoolPosException - in case the player gave an invalid input while choosing the dice

      • performToolCardMove

        public void performToolCardMove(UseToolCardMove move)
                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Method that validates the input when the player chooses a tool card
        Parameters:
        move - the object representing the move
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - in case the tool card is null

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable object,
                   java.lang.Object message)
        Override of method update from observer
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        object - the generic object that will receive the update (can be view or model)
        message - the generic message (can be a move or a message)
